person.persName: Peyton A. Lyon (Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Son of Harriet Lyon. Married to Sarah J. Bailey Lyon in Todd County, Kentucky, on February 1, 1854. Father of Emma Lyon and Elizabeth Lyon. Farmer in Logan County in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved individuals in Logan County in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Logan County in 1862. Farmer in Logan County in 1864.
